title: YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4 Waterproof Nylon with Zipper for Men & Women, Black
descriptions: Introducing the YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4, perfect for both men and women. Made with waterproof nylon and a high-quality custom-made zipper, these bags are perfect for carrying shoes to and from the gym, keeping shoes dust-free in the closet, or even as a makeup or toiletries bag. The set includes 2 standard-sized bags for shoes under size 10, and 2 X-Large bags for shoes between size 10 to 14. With a lifetime warranty covering quality issues, you can trust in the durability and functionality of these sleek black shoe bags. Say goodbye to messy, unorganized travel and hello to convenient, stylish storage with the YAMIU Travel Shoe Bags Set of 4.
